100  // Process a frame request
101  /* Method to service a frame request, called by the Master class through
102  * the reqFrame() method.
103  *
104  * size Minimum size for requested Frame, larger Frame may be allocated
105  * zeroCopyEn Flag which indicates if a zero copy mode Frame is allowed.
106  * Newly allocated Frame pointer (FramePtr)
107  */
108  virtual std::shared_ptr<rogue::interfaces::stream::Frame> acceptReq ( uint32_t size, bool zeroCopyEn );
109 
111  /* This method is called by the Buffer desctructor in order to free
112  * the associated Buffer memory. May be overridden by a subclass to
113  * change the way the buffer data is returned.
114  *
115  * @param data Data pointer to release
116  * @param meta Meta data specific to the allocator
117  * @param size Size of data buffer
118  */
